contents: Article 5 (Method of Announcement) ① Announcements by the Corporation shall be made in general daily newspapers registered as distribution areas nationwide in accordance with Article 9 (1) of the Act on the Promotion of Newspapers, etc. or posted on the bulletin board of the Corporation (including branch offices). Alternatively, it must be announced on the Internet homepage for at least 14 days. Revised 2010. 11. 1., 2014. 12. 29., 2016. 12. 28., 2022. 1. 5., ② The notice pursuant to paragraph 1 may be announced through social network services (SNS). Newly established 2022. 1. 5.
